Document.Title: ASP.NET: “Tip/Trick: Using Server Side Comments with ASP.NET 2.0”; Scott Guthrie

Content:
ASP.NET supports a little known feature called “server-side comments” that you can use to completely disable code/controls/html in a page.  Server-side comments in ASP.NET are delimited using a <%-- --%> syntax.

[http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2006/07/09/
    Tip_2F00_Trick_3A00_-Using-Server-Side-Comments-with-ASP.NET-2.0-.aspx]
